items.title: Rondje Eredivisie: Krijgt Van Persie Feyenoord nog aan de praat?
items.summary: Het weekend is voorbij en dat betekent dat er een Rondje Eredivisie op het programma staat. Koploper PSV won overtuigend van Excelsior en ook Ajax pakte bij Telstar drie punten, terwijl Feyenoord punten liet liggen bij SC Heerenveen. Meer dan genoeg om over na te praten dus.

items.title: Nunc Est Bibendum chases hat-trick on Lingfield Monday card
items.summary: It's a busy Monday on Sky Sports Racing, with Lingfield and Hereford hosting action before evening racing on Wolverhampton's all-weather.

items.title: Van Hanegem plaatst vraagtekens bij Eredivisie-niveau
items.summary: Columnist en oud-voetballer Willem van Hanegem vindt het bijzonder dat Feyenoord ondanks een 'ineenstorting' toch nog steeds plek twee in handen heeft.

items.title: Are fans being turned off multi-club ownership model?
items.summary: Strasbourg fans thought they had it good from being aligned with Chelsea. Then manager Liam Rosenior walked out mid-season to take charge of the Blues.

items.title: 'I'll get goosebumps' - Barnsley duo out to upset old club Liverpool
items.summary: For Adam Phillips and Vimal Yoganathan, it could be the fulfilment of a lifelong dream when Barnsley take on Liverpool at Anfield on Monday.

items.title: Maye leads Patriots past Chargers to claim first playoff win
items.summary: Drake Maye threw a touchdown pass to Hunter Henry in the fourth quarter as the New England Patriots defense roughed up Justin Herbert in a 16-3 AFC Wild Card playoff victory over the Los Angeles Chargers.

items.title: W√©√©r spitsenprobleem bij PSV: alle ballen op Til of de markt op?
items.summary: Opnieuw zit PSV met een aanvallend probleem opgezadeld. Ricardo Pepi brak afgelopen zaterdag tegen Excelsior (5-1) zijn onderarm en dus heeft Peter Bosz geen pure centrumaanvallers meer beschikbaar in de cruciale weken die volgen. PSV leunt op Guus Til, maar kan deze maand nog de markt op.

items.title: Finalekoning Flick is trots na nieuwe zege in El Cl√°sico
items.summary: Na de winst van de Spaanse Super Cup heeft Barcelona-trainer Hansi Flick zijn status als finalekoning weer waargemaakt. In de acht wedstrijden waarin hij een trofee kon winnen, deed hij dat ook. De Duitser is trots op zijn elftal.

items.title: Raphinha shines as Bar√ßa get thrilling win over Madrid in Supercopa final
items.summary: Barcelona claim their first trophy of 2026, avenging October's El Cl√°sico loss with Spanish Supercopa win.

items.title: Raphinha's 'intensity' leads Bar√ßa Supercopa win
items.summary: Barcelona manager Hansi Flick lauded Raphinha's mentality after the Brazilian haunted Real Madrid once again with two goals in his team's 3-2 Spanish Supercopa final win in Saudi Arabia on Sunday.

items.title: Martinelli hat-trick as Arsenal beat Portsmouth
items.summary: Gabriel Martinelli scored a hat-trick as Arsenal overcame an early scare to thrash Championship strugglers Portsmouth 4-1 in the FA Cup third round.

items.title: Liverpool's Bradley out for season with knee injury
items.summary: Liverpool defender Conor Bradley is set to miss the rest of the season after suffering a serious knee injury in Thursday's 0-0 draw with Arsenal.

items.title: USMNT's Pepi suffers broken arm scoring for PSV
items.summary: United States striker Ricardo Pepi suffered a broken forearm while in action for PSV Eindhoven on Saturday and and is set to be sidelined for two months, the Dutch club has confirmed..

items.title: 49ers stun defending Super Bowl champion Eagles in Philly
items.summary: The San Francisco 49ers pulled off a sensational 23-19 upset of the defending Super Bowl champion Philadelphia Eagles to knock them out of the NFL playoffs in the Wild Card round.

items.title: Samenvatting: winnend Ajax maakt het nog aardig spannend tegen Telstar-tiental
items.summary: Ajax is de tweede seizoenshelft met drie punten begonnen. Lang leken de Amsterdammers op hun dooie gemakje te gaan winnen van Telstar in de Eredivisie, maar de promovendus kwam in de slotfase met tien man nog terug tot 2-3.

items.title: European football: McTominay strikes twice as Napoli rescue point at Inter
items.summary: Scotland midfielder scores two equalisers in 2-2 draw Bayern Munich crush Wolfsburg to go 11 points clear Scott McTominay scored a double as the defending champions Napoli twice came from behind to secure a 2-2 draw with the Serie A leaders Inter at San Siro. Inter came close to gaining revenge for their 3-1 defeat in Naples earlier this season and a win would have opened up a commanding gap at the top, but Napoli‚Äôs never-say-die attitude keeps them very much in the title race. Continue reading...

items.title: Man Utd to accelerate appointment after meetings with Carrick and Solskjaer
items.summary: Manchester United are expected to accelerate the process of appointing a new interim head coach, with further detailed talks planned before a final decision is made between Michael Carrick and Ole Gunnar Solskjaer.

items.title: Michael Carrick emerges as favourite to be Manchester United interim manager
items.summary: Former midfielder ahead of Solskj√¶r after interviews Darren Fletcher admits he is in the dark over his position Michael Carrick has emerged as the favourite candidate to be Manchester United‚Äôs interim manager for the rest of the season ahead of Ole Gunnar Solskj√¶r after the interview process, with the club‚Äôs executive expected to finalise the decision on Monday. While Omar Berrada, the chief executive, and Jason Wilcox, the director of football, are understood to have not made a formal offer, they are leaning towards Carrick, sources have informed the Guardian. This follows both Carrick and Solskj√¶r having face-to-face discussions with the hierarchy. Berrada and Wilcox met Carrick on Thursday and Solskj√¶r on Saturday at the club‚Äôs Carrington training ground. Continue reading...

items.title: Raphinha doubles up as Barcelona sink Real Madrid to lift Spanish Super Cup
items.summary: Supercopa de Espa√±a: Barcelona 3-2 Real Madrid Raphinha 36 73, Lewandowski 45+4; Vin√≠cius 45+2, Garc√≠a 45+7 Football is wild sometimes, and this was one of those times. A night that didn‚Äôt always make sense but was a lot of fun ended with every player on the pitch inside the Barcelona penalty area and the ball dropping through the crowd to Ra√∫l Asencio, standing there on the edge of the six yard box. The board had gone up with six minutes on it, those six minutes had passed and now here it was, his moment and another twist: the chance to somehow take the Super Cup final to a penalty shootout. Instead, with the clock on 96.43 Asencio headed at Joan Garc√≠a. On his line, the goalkeeper grabbed the shot and held on hard; his team had done the same, two goals from Raphinha and another from Robert Lewandowski enough to take the trophy, goals from Vin√≠cius J√∫nior and Gonzalo Garc√≠a not enough to take it from them. Whether they will be enough to keep Xabi Alonso in his job remains to be seem; Jeddah was supposed to be the final judgment but there may be those that judge Madrid‚Äôs reaction here reason for him to remain. Continue reading...

items.title: 'They'd take him back in a heartbeat' - Welbeck haunts Man Utd again
items.summary: Veteran striker Danny Welbeck haunts former club Manchester United again and now calls for an England call-up are only going to rise.
